name: To The Mars
description:
Are you ready to climb toward to Mars just for fun?
This is a concise game, nothing more.
You can always repeat it, you learn from mistakes.
It should be simple enough, good luck to everyone.



Can you get to the second level without falling?


Can you make it through this difficult process without falling?

And will you be able to move on to chapter 2?



To The Mars : it is a platform game,you have to climb Toward to Mars by overcoming various platforms and objects to spend your life on Mars,There are checkpoints only at the starting points and not anywhere else, increasing the difficulty of overcoming the game.

CLİMB TO THE MARS!!
